column1: NGR is a rain gauge on OS maps at southern end of Lower Swineshaw Reservoir. Altitudes match. 1950s record has the NR as SK004994, which is 250m NNE, altitudes still match but this location is very close the  gauge at Higher Swineshaw. The 1920s record has a long/lat at the southern end of the reservoir close to the NGR used but actually over the water. There is a note that the gauge is 150 yards from a house, which could be Swineshaw Lodge although there is no link for the observer and the Lodge.
